channel.title: Recent & Upcoming Talks on @GrandomThoughts
channel.description: Recent content in Recent & Upcoming Talks on @GrandomThoughts

item.title: Security Leaders Panel
item.description: This was a panel with a handful of ISOs from Commonwealth Agencies addressing the current concerns and efforts that make up public sector security. No slides were used.

item.title: The “New Norm” in Cyber Security: What’s Trending Now in Public Sector
Emerging Threats
item.description:
“Virginia Commonwealth University School of Business

hosts its sixth annual Risk and Insurance Studies Center Conference, 7:30 a.m., Snead Hall, 301 W. Main St. Jeff Yates, executive director of the Agents Council for Technology, will speak on “New Technologies Drive Changes in the Insurance Industry;” Chris Tignor, chief information security officer, Capital One Financial Corp., will speak about “Protecting Against the Evolving Cyber Threat.” Panel: Alex Ricardo, privacy director for the Beazley Breach Response Programs, The Beazley Group (“Breach Crisis Management”); Bryan Tierney, regional underwriting manager for executive liability, Chartis (“Social Media Revolution”); and Grayson Walters, information security officer, the Virginia State Corporation Commission (“Emerging Threats”).”

There were slides, but they have been lost to antiquity.
